DOC.brief_summary: This is an observational study in primary care aiming to validate biomarkers for chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD).
DOC.brief_title: Prognosis and Treatment of COPD in Primary Care-use of Biomarkers
DOC.criteria: 40 years old or more, diagnosis of COPD in primary care Major psychiatric illness, inability to visit primary care doctor, inability to understand danish language,
